sentences.cn: 别在我面前摆出一副屈尊俯就的样子！
别对我摆出一副纡尊降贵的样子！

sentences.en: Draw on, large quantity food guest, come patronize!
sentences.cn: 吸引到, 大量食客, 到来光顾!

sentences.en: Has been by the old and new customers patronize.
sentences.cn: 一直深受新老客户的光顾.

sentences.en: I'll never patronize that store again.
sentences.cn: 我再也不去光顾那家商店了.

sentences.en: Others are refused to patronize the firm.
sentences.cn: 其他人被拒绝光临这家工厂.

sentences.en: Purchase fresh food from reliable sources. Do not patronize illegal hawkers.
sentences.cn: 购买食物要有可靠的来源. 不要资助违法的饲鹰者.

sentences.en: Some television programmes tend to patronize children.
sentences.cn: 有些电视节目往往以大人的观点对待儿童。

sentences.en: The ladies of Berne liked to patronize the Palace for tea and little cakes.
sentences.cn: 伯尔尼的女士们喜欢去联邦宫殿用茶点。

sentences.en: The program focuses on kids’ interests without patronizing them.
sentences.cn: 该节目以平等的态度关注孩子们的兴趣。

sentences.en: Tom and Beiqi patronize the play, out of Dahuo Er a labyrinth.
sentences.cn: 汤姆和蓓琪光顾着玩耍, 脱离了大伙儿,迷路了.

sentences.en: We cordially welcome all friends and abroad to consult and patronize.
sentences.cn: 昌业五金修配厂热忱欢迎国内外朋友垂询惠顾.

sentences.en: We dislike to have anyone patronize us.
sentences.cn: 我们不喜欢任何人对我们以恩人自居.
我们通常到邻近的商店采买.

sentences.en: Welcome customers new or old to visit and patronize.
sentences.cn: 欢迎新老客户光临惠顾.

sentences.en: Welcome domestic and international enterprise and friend to patronize cooperation heartily.
sentences.cn: 热忱欢迎国内外企业和朋友惠顾合作.

sentences.en: What encouraged me not to become your surety, but to patronize you?
sentences.cn: 究竟我为什么要成为您的——不是担保人, 而是——保护人 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 要人领情的；屈尊俯就的；以恩人态度自居的
女主顾；女资助人；女保护人

trans.tran_cn: 屈尊俯就； 光顾， 惠顾
trans.tran_en: to use or visit a shop, restaurant etc
